LanguageData.CannotMount: Must designate colonist that can be mounted.
LanguageData.NotHumanlikeOrMechanoid: Is not for humanlike or mechanoid.
LanguageData.NotTrainedAnimal: The animal is not trained for 'Obedience'.
LanguageData.TooSmallAnimal: The animal is too small to be mounted.
LanguageData.CannotBoard: Must designate humanlike or colony mechanoid.
LanguageData.NoNeedTreatment: Must designate a pawn who needs treatment.
LanguageData.InvalidPutInTarget: Must designate an item can be hauled
LanguageData.TFH_DescriptionParkingLot: A place for pawns to store vehicles. Pre-requisite for hauling with vehicles.
